content:
ProjectTargetElement Class

In this Article

Represents a Target Element (MSBuild) in an MSBuild project.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerDisplay("Name={Name} #Children={Count} Condition={Condition}")]
public class ProjectTargetElement : Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectElementContainer

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ProjectElement
  • Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectElementContainer
  • ProjectTargetElement

Properties summary

AfterTargets

Gets or sets the AfterTargets attribute value.
AfterTargetsLocation

Location of the AfterTargets attribute
BeforeTargets

Gets or sets the BeforeTargets attribute value.
BeforeTargetsLocation

Location of the BeforeTargets attribute
DependsOnTargets

Gets or sets the DependsOnTargets attribute value. Returns empty string if it is not present. Removes the attribute if the value to set is empty.
DependsOnTargetsLocation

Location of the DependsOnTargets attribute
Inputs

Gets or sets the Inputs attribute value. Returns empty string if it is not present. Removes the attribute if the value to set is empty.
InputsLocation

Location of the Inputs attribute
ItemGroups

Gets all child item groups
KeepDuplicateOutputs

Gets or sets the TrimDuplicateOutputs attribute value.
KeepDuplicateOutputsLocation

Location of the TrimDuplicateOutputs attribute
Name

Gets and sets the name of the this target.
NameLocation

Location of the Name attribute
OnErrors

Get all child OnError Element (MSBuild).
Outputs

Gets or sets the Outputs attribute value. Returns empty string if it is not present. Removes the attribute if the value to set is empty.
OutputsLocation

Location of the Outputs attribute
PropertyGroups

Gets all child property groups.
Returns

Gets or sets the Returns attribute value.
ReturnsLocation

Location of the Returns attribute
Tasks

Gets all child tasks.

Methods summary

AddItemGroup()

Adds an item group after the last child.
AddPropertyGroup()

Adds a property group after the last child.
AddTask(String)

Adds a task to this target after any existing task.

Properties

  • AfterTargets

    Gets or sets the AfterTargets attribute value.

    public string AfterTargets { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the AfterTargets attribute value. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

    Remarks

    Removes the AfterTargets attribute if set to null or an empty string.

  • AfterTargetsLocation

    Location of the AfterTargets attribute

    public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation AfterTargetsLocation { get; }

    Property Value

    • ElementLocation

      Returns ElementLocation.

  • BeforeTargets

    Gets or sets the BeforeTargets attribute value.

    public string BeforeTargets { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the BeforeTargets attribute value. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

    Remarks

    Removes the BeforeTargets attribute if set to null or an empty string.

  • BeforeTargetsLocation

    Location of the BeforeTargets attribute

    public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation BeforeTargetsLocation { get; }

    Property Value

    • ElementLocation

      Returns ElementLocation.

  • DependsOnTargets

    Gets or sets the DependsOnTargets attribute value. Returns empty string if it is not present. Removes the attribute if the value to set is empty.

    public string DependsOnTargets { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the DependsOnTargets attribute value. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

    Remarks

    Removes the DependsOnTargets attribute if the value to set is set to null or an empty string.

  • DependsOnTargetsLocation

    Location of the DependsOnTargets attribute

    public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation DependsOnTargetsLocation { get; }

    Property Value

    • ElementLocation

      Returns ElementLocation.

  • Inputs

    Gets or sets the Inputs attribute value. Returns empty string if it is not present. Removes the attribute if the value to set is empty.

    public string Inputs { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the Inputs attribute value. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

    Remarks

    Removes the Inputs attribute if the value to set is set to null or an empty string.

  • InputsLocation

    Location of the Inputs attribute

    public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation InputsLocation { get; }

    Property Value

    • ElementLocation

      Returns ElementLocation.

  • ItemGroups

    Gets all child item groups

    public System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemGroupElement> ItemGroups { get; }

    Property Value

    • ICollection<ProjectItemGroupElement>

      Returns all child item groups.

  • KeepDuplicateOutputs

    Gets or sets the TrimDuplicateOutputs attribute value.

    public string KeepDuplicateOutputs { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the TrimDuplicateOutputs attribute value. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

    Remarks

    Removes the TrimDuplicateOutputs attribute if the value to set is set to null or an empty string.

  • KeepDuplicateOutputsLocation

    Location of the TrimDuplicateOutputs attribute

    public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation KeepDuplicateOutputsLocation { get; }

    Property Value

    • ElementLocation

      Returns ElementLocation.

  • Name

    Gets and sets the name of the this target.

    public string Name { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the name of the this target.

  • NameLocation

    Location of the Name attribute

    public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation NameLocation { get; }

    Property Value

    • ElementLocation

      Returns ElementLocation.

  • OnErrors

    Get all child OnError Element (MSBuild).

    public System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectOnErrorElement> OnErrors { get; }

    Property Value

    • ICollection<ProjectOnErrorElement>

      Returns all child OnError elements.

  • Outputs

    Gets or sets the Outputs attribute value. Returns empty string if it is not present. Removes the attribute if the value to set is empty.

    public string Outputs { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the Outputs attribute value. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

    Remarks

    Removes the Outputs attribute if the value to set is set to null or an empty string.

  • OutputsLocation

    Location of the Outputs attribute

    public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation OutputsLocation { get; }

    Property Value

    • ElementLocation

      Returns ElementLocation.

  • PropertyGroups

    Gets all child property groups.

    public System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectPropertyGroupElement> PropertyGroups { get; }

    Property Value

    • ICollection<ProjectPropertyGroupElement>

      Returns all child property groups.

  • Returns

    Gets or sets the Returns attribute value.

    public string Returns { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the returns attribute value; null if the attribute is not present

    Remarks

    Removes the attribute only if the value is set to null. An empty string is an allowable value for both getting and setting.

  • ReturnsLocation

    Location of the Returns attribute

    public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation ReturnsLocation { get; }

    Property Value

    • ElementLocation

      Returns ElementLocation.

  • Tasks

    Gets all child tasks.

    public System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectTaskElement> Tasks { get; }

    Property Value

    • ICollection<ProjectTaskElement>

      Returns all child tasks.

Methods

  • AddItemGroup()

    Adds an item group after the last child.

    public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemGroupElement AddItemGroup ();

    Returns

    • ProjectItemGroupElement

      Returns the added item group.

    Remarks

    Convenience method that picks a location based on a heuristic.

  • AddPropertyGroup()

    Adds a property group after the last child.

    public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectPropertyGroupElement AddPropertyGroup ();

    Returns

    • ProjectPropertyGroupElement

      Returns the added property group.

    Remarks

    Convenience method that picks a location based on a heuristic.

  • AddTask(String)

    Adds a task to this target after any existing task.

    public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectTaskElement AddTask (string taskName);

    Parameters

    • taskName
      String

      The name of the task to add.

    Returns

    • ProjectTaskElement

      Returns the added task.

    Remarks

    Convenience method to add a task to this target.
